reviews.review_msg: I really didn't know what to study for when preparing for the exam. The final was brutal though and the prof picked the WORST definitions!
prof's lecture notes make no sense when you go back to them and study them....the course is not that hard but somewhat confusing and a waste of time

A very nice and approachable prof. Receptive to questions and suggestions. Overall the course is good except the emphasis is overly heavy on programming instead of software usage. Very time-consuming course overall, but I guess it is useful to some extent.
Waste of time and tuition money.

I took Bioinformatics with Dr. Brinkman. She is incredibly inspiring, bringing in various SMEs so we could engage directly with leading minds in the field. Her confident, clear lectures made complex topics easy to grasp, and I also admired her great sense of style. I wish I could take more courses with her!
The course suppose to be helpful and easy, but somehow the logic doesn't really make sense. However, the average is A-, so i guess it's still worth to take...
she doesn't explain things well, but who cares?  the class avg was A-, so it's a must-take.
The only mbb course I've ever regretted taking.  Avoid it if possible...it was so confusing, I didn't learn anything at all.
